author: Vexed (@vexingvexed)
description: Calculate simple mathematical expressions, right in Discord with buttons or automatically from sent messages using reactions
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Load the cog and get started with the `calculator` command, or configure automatic detection of expressions from messages with the `calcset autocal` command.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/calc>
name: Calc
short: Calculate simple mathematical expressions, right in Discord with buttons or automatically from sent messages.
